title: Artur Beterbiev vs. Dmitry Bivol
content: Artur Beterbiev(20-0-20) defeated Dmitry Bivol(23-0-12) by majority decision to become the first undisputed light heavyweight champion in the four-belt era. This was probably the most anticipated fight of 21st century, Many including myself think that this fight was robbed and Bivol should have won the match
author: Ankush Gauro

title: UFC 308
content: A UFC Featherweight Championship bout between current champion Ilia Topuria and former champion Max Holloway is to be the headline the event.A five-round middleweight bout between former UFC Middleweight Champion Robert Whittaker and Khamzat Chimaev will also be part of the event.
author: Ankush Gauro
